official_title: A bill to amend the authorization of the demonstration project at Broadway Lake, South Carolina.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to increase the authorization for the silt and aquatic growth removal demonstration project at Broadway Lake, South Carolina.
